snippet: The National Marine Fisheries Service announced that it had decided to grant the Navy permits for its plans that would intensify its sonar use in the Pacific.
abstract: Environmental organizations file lawsuit against National Marine Fisheries Service to demand it force the Navy to consider alternatives to its five-year plan that will intensify sonar use off Southern California and Hawaii.
lead_paragraph: The National Marine Fisheries Service announced that it had decided to grant the Navy permits for its plans that would intensify its sonar use in the Pacific.

headline.main: California: Sonar Use to Rise in Pacific
headline.print_headline: California: Suit Opposes Rise In Sonar
